en.purpose: The primary purpose is to support a typical face to face contact with a patient during which body measurements such as height, weight, hip circumference, waist circumference and head circumference are taken and recorded, including calculated values such as Body Mass Index and Body Surface Area. The template can also be used for patient-reported body measurements.

author.name: Sebastian Garde, Jasmin Buck, Natalia Strauch
author.organisation: Ocean Informatics, University of Heidelberg, Medizinische Hochschule Hannover

author.name: Débora Farage, Adriana Kitajima, Fernanda Maia, Clóvis Puttini, Ana Paula de Andrade

translations.accreditation: MD,DEAA, MBA, specialist in anesthesia, specialist in tropical medicine

at0013.1.description: Palavra única, frase ou breve descrição que representa o significado clínico e a significância do índice de massa corporal.
at0013.1.comment: Por exemplo: abaixo do peso, normal, acima do peso ou obeso.

at0013.1.description: Single word, phrase or brief description that represents the clinical meaning and significance of the body mass index.
at0013.1.comment: For example: underweight, normal, overweight or obese.

at0013.1.description: Een enkel woord, of een uitdrukking of een korte beschrijving die klinische betekenis weergeeft van de body mass index.
at0013.1.comment: Bijvoorbeeld: ondergewicht, normaal, overgewicht of obees.

at0013.1.description: 表示体质指数的临床含义和意义的单个单词、短语或简短描述。
at0013.1.comment: 例如，体重不足、体重正常、体重过重、肥胖

at0013.1.description: Enkeltord, frase eller kort beskrivelse som representerer den kliniske betydningen og signifikansen av kroppsmasseindeksen.
at0013.1.comment: For eksempel undervektig, normalvektig, overvektig eller fedme.

at0013.1.description: Ett ord, en fras eller en kort beskrivning om den kliniska betydelsen av BMI.
at0013.1.comment: Exempelvis: underviktig, normal, överviktig eller fet.

at0013.1.description: Yksittäinen sana, fraasi tai lyhyt kuvaus joka edustaa kehon painoindeksin kliinistä merkitystä.
at0013.1.comment: For example: underweight, normal, overweight or obese.

at0013.1.description: Einzelnes Wort, Phrase oder kurze Beschreibung, die die klinische Bedeutung und die Signifikanz des Body-Mass-Index darstellt.
at0013.1.comment: Zum Beispiel: untergewichtig, normal, übergewichtig oder fettleibig.
